problemStatement.formal: \forall N \geq 1, A \subseteq [1,N] \text{ Sidon}, \forall \epsilon > 0, \exists M, B: A \cup B \text{ Sidon with } |A \cup B| \geq (1-\epsilon)\sqrt{M}
